responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "F22C72EF46F48AB33046D39D3327FA92", "The worm which was his illness wound its way through his bones, and left his skin discolored by the rot which ran through him. His mind, addled by the same scar, became wrathful to his faithful followers. He scorned them for hiding their disgust at this transformation, and wished them away such that he may disappear without a trace.")
name: MADD_0010_MBD_Soulstone1_13
